attributes.action: Make ISP's that operate within the UK stop traffic shaping and provide faster speed broadband.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to stop any ISP's (internet service providers) that operate within the UK, of Traffic shaping (altering bandwidth dependant on users online and content being observed by the user) and also ensure that the UK gets faster speeds like most of the world.
